page.title: 15THE RECTOR OF DURSTON
page.content: The rector of Durston looks after four churches in three parishes.He is the vicar of North Newton and the rector of Durston,Thurloxton and Michaelchurch.He takes services at three different churches on a Sunday morning and one evening service.On the fifth Sunday in a month there is one joint service for all three parishes. Other work he does in the parishes includes,visiting the sick,leading confirmation classes,taking assembly in the primary school,form filling for the diocese and interpreting Church regulations. The last two have become very time consuming.This worries the rector as he feels it is deterring young men from entering the Church. Before becoming ordained,the rector was in the R.A.F.for 16 years.He then entered the Church and became an R.A.F.chaplain.
